item.description:
The best authentic Cuban food and fresh tropical fruit drinks in Jamaica Plain, MA. El Oriental de Cuba features Cuban dishes like Ropa vieja, Rice with octopus, the authentic Cuban sandwich, delicious cuban coffee and more, so says fellow foodie Nancy Rodriguez.

She suggested this way back in February and nearly twenty-five of you expressed an interest in checking it out.

So let's go!

Reservations are NOT accepted, therefore if you RSVP YES, you must be ON TIME so you're able to be seated with us. El Oriental de Cuba has very limited seating so you're unable to bring guests. You must be certain you're able to join us if your RSVP is YES.

Details will be emailed to all those with YES RSVPS.

PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE review the El Oriental de Cuba menu before we arrive so orders are placed promptly.

DIRECTIONS:
Check out Google to arrange your driving directions

PARKING:
On the street....there aren't any meters

PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION: Create your own train and/or bus route here MBTA or Hop Stop
Stoneybrook Station (Orange Line - Inbound)
Walk For 17 Mins. To 416 Centre Street 02130
Walk approx. 1 block W on Boylston St.
Turn right on Lamartine St.
Walk approx. 1 block NE on Lamartine St.
Turn left on Paul Gore St.
Walk approx. 4 blocks NW on Paul Gore St.
El Oriental will be on the left side of the street
OR
Jackson Station (Orange Line - Inbound)
Bus 41 Centre & Eliot Streets
Get off at Centre St & Barbara St
OR
Bus 39 Back Bay from Copley Square
Get off at South Huntington Avenue & Perkins Street
Turn right onto Centre Street walk for 4 minutes

Before I list the Reservation Rules, please understand the NO-SHOW policy was established to ensure everyone who wants to join can and it will be fairly and strictly enforced.

I want to assure you I do understand if you've RSVPd YES and you have a sudden change of plans because you're lost, you don't feel well, you have transportation issues, you don't have the money, or you just don't want to be around people. My only request is for you to let me know as soon as possible so we don't worry about you and our reservation is adjusted. As long as you contact me you will not be considered a NO-SHOW.


Rules for Events with Reservations:

If it is less than twenty-fours from the meal and you are not able to attend or are running late, you MUST call or text me at (617) 445-7549.

Please be considerate of your fellow diners time by arriving promptly.

Please bring enough cash to pay for your meal, drinks, tip, and tax.

All RSVPs are on a first come, first served basis.

You may only RSVP YES or NO. Maybe isn't an option.

Please RSVP YES only if you are certain you will attend.

If you're not sure you can attend because you have other unconfirmed plans or uncertain transportation, please RSVP NO with a comment.

If event is full and you wish to attend, please select WAIT LIST RSVP. When a spot opens, your RSVP will automatically be changed to YES based on the time of your WAIT LIST RSVP.

If your name appears on the event page as a YES after the event and you have not attended, it is counted as a NO-SHOW if you haven't contacted me to advise you're not able to attend.

If I change you're RSVP to NO because you haven't replied to final update event confirmation email deadline, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If any guests you've RSVPd for NO-SHOW each will count as if you've NO-SHOWED. (for this event you're not able to invite guests because the dining area is limited.)

If you change your RSVP from a YES to a NO within twenty-four hours of the event, it is counted as a NO-SHOW if you do not contact me of your change in plans.

If you are a NO-SHOW for three events you are removed from the group.

NO-SHOWS impact everyone; from you, who could or has been on the wait list to the organizer as well as the restaurant's who staff based on our reservation.

An email from you explaining your absence is an expected courtesy.

If you are removed and there were extenuating circumstances, please email me (Tonya) about rejoining.

Your feedback is appreciated so please, rate the event and venue by completing surveys afterward.

I will be inside El Oriental de Cuba at 2:30 PM to welcome you.

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Dining at El Oriental de Cuba
